scenery.Scenery

scenery.Scenery Class Reference

Scenery are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty. More...

Detailed Description

Scenery are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty.

Member Function Documentation

def scenery.Scenery.draw (   self,
  screen,
  camera,
  progress,
  scale = 1 
)

Draw the piece of scenery.

This is called by the game's Map instance before any other objects are drawn.

def scenery.Scenery.getBounds (   self  ) 

Return the bounding box for the item.

Required for items to be insertable into QuadTree instances.
